<style>
    .datepicker {
        z-index:99999 !important;
    }
    #Forgot {
        display: none
    }
    .otpverifysection {
        display:none;
        padding-left: 15px;
        padding-right: 15px;
        font-size: 14px !important;
    }
    .otpverifysection label { font-size: 14px !important; }

    #Login {
        display:none;
    }
    #OtpLogin { 
        display:none;
    }
    .twt_login img, .fb_login img , .otp_login img{
        width:160px;
    }

    #user_otp_add {
        box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    #resendotp {
        color: #1fb7cd;
    }

    .verify_otp_btn_section {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        margin: 25px 0;
    }

    .edit_otp_no {
        color: #FFF !important;
        margin-left: 15px;
        border-radius: 50px;
        padding: 3px 10px;
    }
    .edit_otp_no:hover { background-image: none !important; background-color: #1FB7CD; }

<script>
    var recaptcha_forgot_password_widget;
    $(".fb_login").click(function () {
        setreferrerUrl();
    });
    $(".twt_login").click(function () {
        setreferrerUrl();
    });

    $("#forgot").click(function () {
        $("div#Login").css({
            "display": "none",
        });
        $("div#Forgot").css({
            "display": "block",
        });
        $("div#ForgotPopup").css({
            "display": "block",
        });
        recaptcha_forgot_password_widget = grecaptcha.render('recaptcha_forgot_password', {
            'sitekey': '6Ld8PDIUAAAAAK6bCoxKaq19Sx0HO8TTdAisinKB',
            // 'theme': 'light'
        });
    });
    $('.loginClose').bind('click', function () {
        $("#OtpLogin").hide();
    });
    $("#editnumberotp").click(function () {
        $('.otpverifysection').hide();
        $('.otprequestsection').show();
        $("#mobile_add").focus();
    });
    $(".otp_login").click(function () {
        $(".otpverifysection").hide();
        $(".otprequestsection").show();
        $("div#Login").css({
            "display": "none",
        });
        $("div#Forgot").css({
            "display": "none",
        });
        $("div#ForgotPopup").css({
            "display": "none",
        });
        $("div#OtpLogin").css({
            "display": "block",
        });

    });
    $("#otp_button").click(function () {
        let mobileNumber = $("#mobile_add_otp").val();
        if (mobileNumber == '' || mobileNumber.length !== 10 || !Number.isInteger(parseInt(mobileNumber))) {
            $("#message_otplogin").html('<div class="alert alert-danger">Please Enter a valid 10 digit mobile no.</div>').show();
        } else {
            $("#message_otplogin").html("").hide();
            $.ajax({
                url: JS_BASE_URL + 'mobileotplogin/requestotp',
                data: {action: 'otplogin', mobileno: mobileNumber},
                method: 'POST',
                success: function (response) {
                    console.log(response);
                    var responseObj = $.parseJSON(response);

                    if (responseObj._resultflag === '1') {
                        $("#message_otplogin").html('<div class="alert alert-success">' + responseObj.message + '</div>').show();
                        $(".otprequestsection").hide();
                        $(".otpverifysection").show();

                        localStorage.setItem("userid", responseObj.userdetail.appid);
                        localStorage.setItem("mobileNumber", mobileNumber);
                        $("#numberdiv").html(mobileNumber);
                    } else {
                        $("#message_otplogin").html('<div class="alert alert-danger">' + responseObj.message + '</div>').show();
                    }
                }
            });
        }

    });
    $("#resendotp").click(function () {

        let mobileNumber = localStorage.getItem("mobileNumber");
        $("#message_otplogin").html("").hide();
        $.ajax({
            url: JS_BASE_URL + 'mobileotplogin/requestotp',
            data: {action: 'otplogin', mobileno: mobileNumber},
            method: 'POST',
            success: function (response) {
                console.log(response);
                var responseObj = $.parseJSON(response);
                if (responseObj._resultflag === '1') {
                    $(".otprequestsection").hide();
                    $(".otpverifysection").show();
                    $("#message_otplogin").html('<div class="alert alert-success">Resend OTP Successfully</div>').show();
                    localStorage.setItem("userid", responseObj.userdetail.appid);
                    // localStorage.setItem("mobileNumber", mobileNumber);
                }
            }
        });
    });
    $("#otp_button_submit").click(function () {
        let otp = $("#user_otp_add").val();
        let mobileNumber = localStorage.getItem("mobileNumber");

        if (otp !== '' || otp.length === 4 || Number.isInteger(parseInt(otp))) {
            $("#message_otplogin").html("").hide();
            $.ajax({
                url: JS_BASE_URL + 'mobileotplogin/verifyotp',
                data: {otptokencode: otp, mobileno: mobileNumber, addressid: localStorage.getItem("userid")},
                method: 'POST',
                success: function (response) {
                    var responseObj = $.parseJSON(response);

                    if (responseObj._resultflag === '1') {
                        $("#message_otplogin").html('<div class="alert alert-success">User Logged In Successfully</div>').show();
                        if (!responseObj.isdetailfilled) {
                            location.href = JS_BASE_URL + 'subscribe';
                        } else {
                            location.reload();
                        }
                    } else {
                        $("#message_otplogin").html('<div class="alert alert-danger">' + responseObj.message + '</div>').show();
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            $("#message_otplogin").html('<div class="alert alert-danger">Invalid Otp</div>').show();
        }

    });
    function clevertapLogininfo() {
        var LoginForm = $("#email_address").val();
        // each of the below mentioned fields are optional
// with the exception of one of Identity, Email, FBID or GPID
        clevertap.onUserLogin.push({
            "Site": {
                "Email": LoginForm, // String
//   "MSG-email": false,                // Disable email notifications
//   "MSG-push": true,                  // Enable push notifications
//   "MSG-sms": true                    // Enable sms notifications
            }
        });

    }

</script>        
<div class="search">
            <a href="#" id="searchbox"><span>Search <img src="https://staticmain.narendramodi.in/images/searchIcon.jpg" alt="Search"></span></a>
        <div id="access_searchbox" style="">
        <div class="searchDDarrow"></div>
        <div class="form">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-sm-12">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="enterkeyword" class="sr-only"> Enter Keyword </label>
                        <input type="text" placeholder="Enter Keyword" onkeypress="getAutocomplete('globalkeyword')" class="form-control srch" id="globalkeyword">
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-sm-5">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="searchfrom" class="sr-only"> From </label>
                        <input type="text" placeholder="From" class="form-control hasDatepicker" id="globalfromdate">
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-5">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="searchto" class="sr-only"> To </label>
                        <input type="text" placeholder="To" class="form-control hasDatepicker" id="globaltodate">
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-sm-12" id="searchbtn">
                    <input type="button" value="Go" onclick="globalSearch()" class="commonBtn  btn btn-animated btn-split rippler rippler-default">
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <input type="hidden" id="globallang" value="en">
    
<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $("#globalfromdate").datepicker();
        $("#globaltodate").datepicker();
    });
    function globalSearch()
    {
        var globalkeyword = $("#globalkeyword").val().replace(/#/i, "");
        var globalfromdate = $("#globalfromdate").val();
        var gloabaltodate = $("#globaltodate").val();
        var globallang = $("#globallang").val();
        var url = JS_BASE_URL + "news?&keyword=" + globalkeyword + "&fromdate=" + globalfromdate + "&todate=" + gloabaltodate;
        console.log(url);
        window.location.href = url;
    }
    $("#globalkeyword").keyup(function (event) {
        if (event.keyCode == 13) {
            globalSearch();
        }
    });
    $("#globalfromdate").keyup(function (event) {
        if (event.keyCode == 13) {
            globalSearch();
        }
    });
    $("#globaltodate").keyup(function (event) {
        if (event.keyCode == 13) {
            globalSearch();
        }
    });


</script>

                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pm-s-address-at-the-inauguration-of-new-metro-link-between-noida-and-delhi">Governance cannot happen when the dominant thought process begins at 'mera kya' and ends at 'mujhe kya': PM</a></div>

                    <div class="speechesItem">We live in an era in which connectivity is all important: PM Modi

                        </a></div>
                    <div class="speechesItem">Every citizen has something or the other to contribute to the nation: PM Modi
Innovation is life. When there is no innovation, there is stagnation: PM Modi
Only Governments &amp; Government initiati</div>
                    <div class="pwdBy"> August 17, 2017 </div>

                <div class="speechesBox" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px;">
                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pm-s-address-at-the-release-of-the-book-titled-selected-speeches-of-the-president-vol-4-">President Pranab Mukherjee is extremely knowledgeable and extremely simple: PM Modi</a></div>
                    <div class="speechImg left_class"><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pm-s-address-at-the-release-of-the-book-titled-selected-speeches-of-the-president-vol-4-">
                                        <img src="https://cdn.narendramodi.in/cmsuploads/0.46533500_1500918982_attachsp.jpg" alt="President Pranab Mukherjee is extremely knowledgeable and extremely simple: PM Modi" title="President Pranab Mukherjee is extremely knowledgeable and extremely simple: PM Modi" class="img-responsive">
                        </a></div>
                    <div class="speechesItem">President Pranab Mukherjee is extremely knowledgeable and extremely simple: PM Modi

                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pm-s-address-at-the-foundation-ceremony-of-various-projects-of-kandla-port-in-gandhidham-gujarat">PM inaugurates Pumping Station at Bhachau; Narmada Waters released for Tappar dam</a></div>

                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/prime-minister-narendra-modi-launched-interactive-digital-exhibition-swachhagraha-bapu-ko-karyanjali-ek-abhiyan-ek-pradarshani-marking-100-years-of-champaran-satyagraha-at-national-archives-of-india">Aim of Satyagraha was independence and aim of Swachhagraha is to create a clean India: PM Modi</a></div>

                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pm-modi-addresses-public-rally-in-gonda-uttar-pradesh">Wrong Doings of SP, BSP, Congress Exposed; Urge People to Elect BJP Government: PM Modi</a></div>
                    <div class="speechImg left_class"><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pm-modi-addresses-public-rally-in-gonda-uttar-pradesh">
                                                        <img src="https://cdn.narendramodi.in/cmsuploads/0.36277400_1488806971_gondattach.jpg" alt="Yoga has the potential to herald in a new Yuga of peace, compassion, brotherhood : PM Modi" title="Wrong Doings of SP, BSP, Congress Exposed; Urge People to Elect BJP Government: PM Modi" class="img-responsive">
                        </a></div>
                    <div class="speechesItem">

                    <div class="speechesItem">Our determination is to work for everyone. Nation building is priority for us: PM

                    <div class="pwdBy"> August 18, 2016 </div>

                </div>

                <div class="speechesBox" style="position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px;">
                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/pm-s-speech-at-the-inauguration-of-newly-constructed-building-of-esic-medical-college-and-hospital-coimbatore-">I am encouraged to work more for welfare of the workforce of India &amp; strive towards making the country a better work place for all: PM Modi</a></div>

                        </a></div>
                    <div class="speechesItem">PM Modi speaks at the 46th Indian Labour Conference
The country cannot be happy, if the worker is unhappy. As a society, we need to respect the Dignity of Labour: PM
If we want to move ahead, we nee</div>
                    <div class="pwdBy"> July 20, 2015 </div>

Qiu Yong, President of Tsinghua University Foreign Minister Wang Yi Shi Yigong, Assistant President of Tsinghua University I am truly delighted to be at the Tsinghua University today. You are a worl</div>
                    <div class="pwdBy"> May 15, 2015 </div>

                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pms-statement-in-the-joint-press-briefing-with-afghan-president-dr-ashraf-ghani">Text of PM's Statement in the Joint Press Briefing with Afghan President, Dr. Ashraf Ghani</a></div>
                    <div class="speechImg left_class"><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pms-statement-in-the-joint-press-briefing-with-afghan-president-dr-ashraf-ghani">
                                        <img src="https://cdn.narendramodi.in/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/636-400-CROP-PM-MODI-in-Joint-Press-Briefing-with-Afghan-President-Ashraf-Ghani-3.jpg" alt="Text of PM's Statement in the Joint Press Briefing with Afghan President, Dr. Ashraf Ghani" title="Text of PM's Statement in the Joint Press Briefing with Afghan President, Dr. Ashraf Ghani" class="img-responsive">
                        </a></div>
                    <div class="speechesItem">
His Excellency, President Ashraf Ghani, members of the media,
I am delighted to welcome President Ghani and his delegation to India.

We are meeting in the shadow of the horrible calamity in Nepa</div>
                    <div class="pwdBy"> April 28, 2015 </div>
                    <div class="pull-right smShareIcon">

                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-prime-ministers-mann-ki-baat-on-all-india-radio-april">Text of Prime Ministers Mann ki Baat on All India Radio</a></div>

                        </a></div>
                    <div class="speechesItem">

My Dear Countrymen,
Namaskar!
I was not feeling like doing Mann ki Baat today. I am feeling heavy and burdened and little distressed. There were news of hailstorm, unseasonal rains and damages t</div>

                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/pm-modi-unveils-bust-of-mahatma-gandhi-in-hannover">PM Modi unveils bust of Mahatma Gandhi in Hannover</a></div>

                        </a></div>
                    <div class="speechesItem">
On the evening of Sunday 12th April 2015 the Prime Minister unveiled a Statue of Mahatma Gandhi in Hannover, Germany. The PM paid rich tributes to Gandhi ji and his ideals. A large number of </div>
                    <div class="pwdBy"> April 12, 2015 </div>

                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pms-remarks-to-the-business-community-in-colombo-sri-lanka">Text of PMs Remarks to the Business Community in Colombo, Sri Lanka</a></div>
                    <div class="speechImg left_class"><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pms-remarks-to-the-business-community-in-colombo-sri-lanka">
                                            <img src="https://cdn.narendramodi.in/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/att_busicolmbo_130315.jpg" alt="Text of PMs Remarks to the Business Community in Colombo, Sri Lanka" title="Text of PMs Remarks to the Business Community in Colombo, Sri Lanka" class="img-responsive">
                        </a></div>
                    <div class="speechesItem">
Business representatives from India and Sri Lanka,
Distinguished guests,

I am delighted to be here at the Ceylon Chamber of Commerce.
Thank you for coming here in such large numbers.
It is a r</div>
                    <div class="pwdBy"> March 13, 2015 </div>

                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/statement-to-the-media-by-pm-in-mauritius">Statement to the media by PM in Mauritius</a></div>

                    <div class="speechesItem">

I sincerely thank you for your warm welcome and the extraordinary hospitality.
I am very grateful to you and the people of Mauritius for </div>

                    <div class="speechesItemLink left_class "><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/prime-ministers-statement-to-the-media-during-his-visit-to-seychelles">Prime Minister's statement to the Media during his visit to Seychelles</a></div>
                    <div class="speechImg left_class"><a class="left_class" href="https://www.narendramodi.in/prime-ministers-statement-to-the-media-during-his-visit-to-seychelles">
                                            <img src="https://cdn.narendramodi.in/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/636-400-CROP-6.1-PM-Modi-MEDIA-SPEECH-with-President-James-Michel-of-Seychelles.jpg" alt="Prime Minister's statement to the Media during his visit to Seychelles" title="Prime Minister's statement to the Media during his visit to Seychelles" class="img-responsive">

                    <div class="speechesItem">
Thank you, President Michel, for your kind words.
I am deeply touched by your extraordinary hospitality and warmth.
I regret that this is a very short visit. I would have loved to stay longer. Any</div>
                    <div class="pwdBy"> March 11, 2015 </div>

<div id="loader" style="display: none;">
    <center><img src="https://staticmain.narendramodi.in/images/loader.GIF">
    </center>
</div>
<div id="noRecords" style="display: none;">
    <center><span>No Records Found</span>
    </center>
</div>
        <input type="hidden" id="totalspeechePages" value="107">
        <input type="hidden" id="speecheLanguage" value="en">

         
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    var pageName = "text-speeches";
    clevertap.event.push("Page Viewed", {
        "Screen name": pageName
    });
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

    $(window).load(function () {
        $(".speeches").vgrid({
            easing: "easeOutQuint",
            time: 500,
            delay: 20,
            fadeIn: {
                time: 300,
                delay: 50
            }
        });
    });

    $(document).ready(function () {
        $("#fromdate").datepicker();
        $("#todate").datepicker();
    });
    var Speechloading = false;
    var SpeechPage = 1;
    var searchSpeechpage = 1;
    var total;
    $(window).on('scroll', function () {
        if (($(window).scrollTop() / ($(document).height() - $(window).height())) > 0.95) {
            var fromdate = $('#fromdate').val();
            var todate = $('#todate').val();
            var language = $('#serachlanguage').val();
            var keyword = $('#searchkeyword').val();
            if (keyword != "" || language != "" || todate != "" || fromdate != "")
            {
                if (searchSpeechpage < $("#totalSearchspeeches").val())
                {
                    if (!Speechloading) {
                        Speechloading = true;
                        loadSearchSpeeche(searchSpeechpage);
                    }
                }
            } else
            {
                if (SpeechPage < $("#totalspeechePages").val())
                {
                    if (!Speechloading) {
                        Speechloading = true;
                        loadSpeeche(SpeechPage);
                    }

                }
            }
        }
    });
    function loadSpeeche(speechePageno)
    {
        speechePageno = speechePageno + 1;
        var language = document.getElementById('speecheLanguage');
        $("#loader").css("display", "block");
        $.ajax({
            url: JS_BASE_URL + 'speech/loadspeeche?page=' + speechePageno + '&language=' + language.value,
            success: function (data) {
                if (data != "") {
                    $('#maincontainer').append(data);
                    $(".speeches").vgrid({
                        easing: "easeOutQuint",
                        time: 500,
                        delay: 20,
                    });
                    Speechloading = false;
                    SpeechPage++;
                    $("#loader").css("display", "none");
                }
            }
        });
    }
    $("#searchspeeches").on("click", function () {
        var fromdate = $("#fromdate").val();
        var todate = $("#todate").val();
        var language = $("#serachlanguage").val();
        var keyword = $("#searchkeyword").val();
        if (keyword != "" || language != "" || todate != "" || fromdate != "")
        {
            if (language == "")
            {
                language = "en";
            }
            $("#search_loader").css("display", "block");
            $.ajax({
                url: JS_BASE_URL + 'speech/searchspeeche?language=' + language + '&page=' + searchSpeechpage + '&keyword=' + keyword + '&fromdate=' + fromdate + '&todate=' + todate,
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data != "") {
                        //alert(data);
                        $('#maincontainer').html("");
                        $('#maincontainer').html(data);
                        $(".speeches").vgrid({
                            easing: "easeOutQuint",
                            time: 500,
                            delay: 20,
                        });
                        Speechloading = false;
                        searchSpeechpage = 1;
                        $("#loader").css("display", "none");
                        $("#search_loader").css("display", "none");
                    } else {
                        $('#maincontainer').html("");
                        $("#noRecords").css("display", "block");


                    }
                }
            });
        } else
        {
            var language = $("#speecheLanguage").val();
            $("#search_loader").css("display", "block");
            $.ajax({
                url: JS_BASE_URL + 'speech/loadspeeche?page=' + 1 + '&language=' + language,
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data != "") {
                        $('#maincontainer').html("");
                        $('#maincontainer').html(data);
                        $(".speeches").vgrid({
                            easing: "easeOutQuint",
                            time: 500,
                            delay: 20,
                        });
                        Speechloading = false;
                        SpeechPage = 1;
                        $("#search_loader").css("display", "none");
                        $("#noRecords").css("display", "none");
                    }
                }
            });
        }

    });
    function loadSearchSpeeche(searchSpeechpageNo)
    {
        var fromdate = $("#fromdate").val();
        var todate = $("#todate").val();
        var language = $("#serachlanguage").val();
        var keyword = $("#searchkeyword").val();
        if (language == "")
        {
            language = "en";
        }
        searchSpeechpageNo = searchSpeechpageNo + 1;
        $("#loader").css("display", "block");
        $.ajax({
            //url: JS_BASE_URL + 'quotes/loadquotes?Page=' page + '&lang=' + language'
            url: JS_BASE_URL + 'speech/searchspeeche?language=' + language + '&page=' + searchSpeechpageNo + '&keyword=' + keyword + '&fromdate=' + fromdate + '&todate=' + todate,
            success: function (data) {
                if (data != "") {
                    $('#maincontainer').append(data);
                    $(".speeches").vgrid({
                        easing: "easeOutQuint",
                        time: 500,
                        delay: 20,
                    });
                    Speechloading = false;
                    searchSpeechpage++;
                    $("#loader").css("display", "none");
                }
            }
        });
    }
</script> 
                </section>

            </div>
